title: First
info: Bodybuilding Beginnings: Arnold Schwarzenegger didn’t speak English when he first moved to the United States, but he still won the Mr. Olympia bodybuilding title multiple times.

title: Second
info: The Car Collection: Arnold is known for his love of cars, but what’s amusing is that he once traded a Ferrari for a used Humvee.

title: Third
info: Unlikely Role: After his famous action roles, Arnold became the governor of California in 2003.

title: Fourth
info: The Cactus Incident: Arnold once bought a giant cactus for his home, but when it arrived, it was much larger than expected.
